short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Skipper: Automatically skips intros, recaps, next episodes on Netflix, Amazon Prime, and skips ads on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Skipper is your seamless companion for an uninterrupted viewing experience across Netflix, YouTube, and Amazon Prime Video. It automatically skips intros, recaps, and transitions to the next episode on Netflix, ensuring you dive straight into the action. On YouTube, it intelligently clicks the 'Skip Ad' button, bypassing those annoying interruptions, and on Amazon Prime Video, it skips intros and recaps effortlessly. Whether you're binge-watching your favorite series or exploring new content, Auto Skipper takes care of the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what you love most. Install now to enjoy a smoother, more efficient streaming experience!
